TopicTitle: Include electrical efficiency statistics for electric engines.

Articles.Content:
The statistics for electrical engines should include the kilowatt to newton ratio, this being a balance point for engines would allow the lower isp/thrust engines to have an edge (such as the dawn engine being more electrical efficient then the VASIMR engine), and reflect a real life choice regarding ion engines.

Also some early game low electric and isp efficent relatively high thrust arcjets and some insanely high efficient low thrust power hog electrical engines would be very cool for spaceships.

Edited January 12, 2023 by Strawberry
OO that's a good idea. Useful piece of info to put under the "advanced" tab, since we're going to see a LOT more SEP long burns.
